posts.post_content:
I just acquired a collection of 90 raw, mostly poor-VG with some VG-EX and EX T206 cards, including 1 Broad Leaf Barbeau poor, 2 Cycle 460, 5 Cycle 350, ~20 Polar Bear, 7 Sovereign (including Vic Willis throwing G-VG), 2 El Principe De Gales, 1 Old Mill SL, 1 Old Mill black, ~20 Sweet Caporal and ~30 Piedmont (incl. Tinker poor and Titus G-VG). Please PM or email me at [url]spencerdorsey@gmail.com[/url] with your want lists, and I'll see if we have any matches when I get home from work today.

Spencer Dorsey

Can you please PM me the details on the Cycle 460's. You can also email me at [url]mmw2161@aol.com[/url]

Thanks,

Jerry
Pm sent regarding the poorest of the poor cards
